Reviews.Title: 1st Android phone
Reviews.Author: T. Gainer "Coffee & Tea lover"
Reviews.Content: I'm a Consumer Cellular customer. Consumer Cellular is an ATT reseller with no contracts and great rates. I've had the LG Thrive for a week and I now see why everyone raves about the Android OS. Thousands of Apps, fast response and easy to learn. LG makes a quality phone and the Thrive is solid and fast for the money I paid. Definitely a good phone. I'm looking forward to learning everything it can do.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Karen Halley
Reviews.Content: a relaible phone. A very good price for this phone that can do a million things. I live in the caribbean, and I just put my chip in and it worked right away. It is very good for using the internet and it's very user friendly. Glad I bought this phone instead of a more pricey one, it does the same things the more pricey one do and it also takes realy nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: 64 year old "youngsters" review
Reviews.Author: M. LOONEY
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone over a year ago, and it has worked perfectly for me. It is a locked att phone and I am currently using straight talk. I get unlimited, talk, text, and data for 50.37 a month. The description of this phone being for children is misleading.The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is it being locked. At the time I bought it I was a satisfied att customer. I was on a prepaid plan and my bill kept going up. So, I switched to straight talk. Because the phone is locked it will go back to to att sometimes, and that can be a pain. I have to switch it back to straight talk. At this time I have an 8gb micro-disc and 24 aps downloaded, not counting the ones it came with.I plan to buy an unlocked LG thrive in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Konrad Finck
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these phones 2 1/2 years ago and I have been well satisfied with it.  I recently purchased a second identical phone for my wife.  It's not the most high powered phone, but it works well, runs all the apps I need, and can be used on AT&T;'s pay-as-you-go plan without a data plan. I wanted a phone that could be used as a wi-fi only smartphone, and this one fills the bill.  Since I don't do a lot of calling, my total average phone charges for most months is about $14.

Reviews.Title: LG Thrive
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I just bought this phone a few days ago and I love it! It's a great phone, fast, great graphics. I would definitely recommend this phone to anybody looking for an entry level smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: LiL
Reviews.Content: I gave the phone this rating because it is every thing it was advertised to be. I got it for a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a birthday present for someone and she's very happy with it.  Nice detailed screen, lots of android apps, and snappy.  Using it in Canada with the Fido network on 3G without any problems.

Reviews.Title: NEVER AGAIN!!
Reviews.Author: Shawty Langg
Reviews.Content: This phone was not unlocked on receipt and the unlock didn't work. I gave away the phone due to frustration.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, but YOU WON'T GET TMOBILE 3G/4G
Reviews.Author: Gazi M. Rashid
Reviews.Content: Phone works great. I had it for 2 years before and it was fantastic. But I wanted to use this particular one for tmobile and the tmobile 3g/4g won't work on this phone because it uses different bandwidths. I made this mistake.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!
Reviews.Author: Cindy N
Reviews.Content: I had to exchange twice so this was a huge hassle, but I LOVE THIS PHONE. Perfect size and relatively easy to work.  My first ever phone smartphone.  Had no idea how to text or anything fancy.  This phone is only 3G, but I'm too new to this to care.  Fits my hand perfect. Crystal clear display, easier than I thought to work.  Voice record is fab since I am always needing to remind myself to do things when I have no pen or paper.  Good camera and video is easy too. I have only had it 2 weeks, but overall I'm glad I bought this one.

Reviews.Title: 100% better than palm pixi
Reviews.Author: Melk
Reviews.Content: For less than the Palm Pixi's we originally bought, we bought these phones (after losing 1 palm the 1st month of having them and another 3 months later) and it is such an amazing difference in the phone quality.  The phone has been easy to use (we are using it on T-mobile), it downloads apps easily and the call quality is great.  I recommend a case if you are as clumsy as I am, there are some really nice ones (the hardcovers protect well).  This has been a great product, you will need a mini sd chip to store anything, I would recommend a 16 or 32 MB one, they are cheapest online here.  I considered this a steal.

Reviews.Title: A good cell phone for a good price
Reviews.Author: dania
Reviews.Content: a good phone for a good price. recommended for those who had a old one and need to buy a cellphone cheap with android system

Reviews.Title: Really good smart phone for beginners
Reviews.Author: Jenny L. Nowicki
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my phone broke and I still have a year in my contract. I have alot of pictures and loads faster even with a large sd card. I was surprised with the little camera, it's better quality than my old phones, Samsung Impression, and Samsung Flight.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: chao
Reviews.Content: This phone works well and very good . The only problem why it has 4 rating is because of the little memory it has

Reviews.Title: Phone is a piece of crap.
Reviews.Author: dtayld1
Reviews.Content: It worked fine for the first month, then MAGICALLY after the warranty was void, it started freaking out. It would call 911 for no reason. It was on my counter, and then it dialed 911. Also, I would have full service, and it would act like I didn't, and I could make emergency calls only. I would have to restart the phone then it would work, but it would do it any time I had no service and I lived in a town where the most bars you would have is 2 or 3. It was a huge pain in the ass. I would not recommend this phone to ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: tjblackfoot
Reviews.Content: It has an old operating system and can't download much from the app store. I can never get on the web unless I'm within 20 feet of a hot spot.  When I talk on the phone, the screen is so sensitive my cheek pushes all the buttons.

Reviews.Title: Could not synch to Google accounts
Reviews.Author: Judith Ahrens
Reviews.Content: The Thrive would not allow me to synch from the phone to my Google account...I could not make calendar entries on the device and have them show up on my PC (but it did synch the other direction).  However I had no trouble returning it to Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great phone !
Reviews.Author: Kevin Pena
Reviews.Content: works like a charm ! easy to use ! great for people who are going to get phones for the first time

Reviews.Title: PHONE LIKE NEW!!!
Reviews.Author: Nisha A.
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase this phone, it seemed right for the price. I have had this phone for over three weeks now and it works great, although it was a used it looked fairly new, the features all work well also and signal is great. I received it way before the estimated arrival date, service was very prompt. I would definitely recommend this product and seller.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with phone.
Reviews.Author: Terry Mathieson
Reviews.Content: I am new to smartphones, so chose this one based on positive ratings.  So far so good.  It seems large.

Reviews.Title: LG Thrive is a great smart phone
Reviews.Author: Jean Thomas-Wright
Reviews.Content: It is a great smart cellphone. It is easy to use and holds perfectly in your hands. It is the phone to have.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality phone with wifi and all.
Reviews.Author: Rehan
Reviews.Content: Phone is very easy to use. add an SD card to add music etc.  wifi works great; i really like the phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dixie
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my teenage daughter.  It's a perfect compromise between her desire for internet access and my desire to not have to pay for a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work from the start
Reviews.Author: A. Burns
Reviews.Content: It may have just been a bad one, but it did not work from the start.After this, I do not want to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Jennifer J Long "JJCross"
Reviews.Content: It's okay thought there would be a bigger screen.  misleading sellers don't tell  you whether or not they take regular size sims or micro sim cards.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: a_nn87
Reviews.Content: THE LG THRIVE P506 IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT.  I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE.  LOVE LOVE LOVE IT.  THE FEATURES ARE GREAT.

Reviews.Title: nothing wrong with actual phone
Reviews.Author: miss kimmi
Reviews.Content: use to be able to get free wifi on these phonesat&t; has found a way to charge you while u are on "free" wifi

Reviews.Title: Where's the sim card???
Reviews.Author: Linda Bachelder
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize that unlocked ment no sim card......The info booklet is so small, anyone that can't read small print watch out.  Not impressed.  Thank goodness it is a replacement At&t; Thrive phone and we can us all the old info.  Other than that the phone is the same as the old one which works fine but is a bit heavy.
